job.title: Principal Software Test Engineer
job.description: pEaglePicher Technologies is looking for a Software Test Leader in safety critical software systemsnbspThe leader has the ability to shape the future of software testing in the organizationnbspCome join the team to ensure the safety of the software for cutting edge lithium ion battery management systems and integrated power solutions that are being used to power the next generation of spacecraft jets and shipsppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliHandsOn Leader of the software test teams for customer software productsliliEstablishes the Test Management Process for customer product deliverables in compliance with thenbspEaglePicher software development processliliCreate software verification plans software test plans and software quality assurance plansliliPerform software validation testing against user interface manualsliliPerform software verification testing against software requirement specificationsliliEnsure all software tools are validated and tracked for changesliliReview software requirements specifications for compliance with product requirements standardliliReview software design documents for compliance with product design standardliliIdentify efficient cost effective test tool solutions for robust test coverageliliSupports and develops software engineers by providing test advice and coaching in technical reviewsliliParticipate in safety and cybersecurity risk analysisliliPart of the annual reviewmaintenance of thenbspEaglePicher software development processliliProtects customer and corporate operations by keeping information confidentialliliEnsures all software test team members maintain their tool training requirementsliliUpdates job knowledge by studying stateoftheart software test tools automation testing techniques and efficient test processes by enrolling in educational opportunities reading professional publications and participating in professional organizationsliulpbrppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongppTo succeed in this position you mustpulliMust be a US Citizen or Permanent ResidentliliPrior hands on experience as a Senior or Principal Software Test EngineerliliBachelors Degree in Engineering or PhysicsliliExperience in implementing a Software Test Management SystemliliPerformed software test activities for both embedded systems and desktop applicationsliliCreation of software test traceability and test summary reportsliliWorking knowledge of CC and RTOSliliWorking knowledge of CliliWorking experience in a regulated environmentliliManaged software tool validationliliParticipated in definition andor maintenance of corporate software development processliliExperience working with embedded software development engineers for test design hooksliliExperience using lab equipment such as oscilloscopes logic analyzers and power suppliesliulpbrppstrongHIRING PREFERENCESstrongppIn addition to meeting the basic requirements the most successful candidates will also havepulliMasters Degree in Engineering or PhysicsliliExperience with an Application Lifecycle Management SystemliliPerformed software test activities for web client andor server applicationsliliWorking experience with TestStand andor LabviewliliWorking knowledge of JavaliliWorking knowledge of PythonliliImplementation of an automated software test solutionliulpbrppbrppstrongABOUT EAGLEPICHERstrongppEaglePicher Technologies LLC is a leading producer of batteries and energetic devices for the defense aerospace medical commercial oil and gas industries The company provides the most experience and broadest capability in battery electrochemistry of any battery supplier in the United States Battery technologies include lithium ion thermal silver zinc lithium carbon monofluoride lithium thionyl chloride lithium manganese dioxide lithium sulfur dioxide and reserve lithium oxyhalide EaglePicher also provides custom battery assemblies battery management systems pyrotechnic devices and other power solutionsnbspEaglePicher Technologies is headquartered in Joplin MO and is ISO90012008 ISO 13485 and AS9100C certifiednbspFor more information visit wwweaglepichercomppnbspppstrongPERKS OF BEING AN EAGLEPICHER EMPLOYEEstrongppSome of the great things about being an EaglePicher employee includepulliMedical dental vision life and disability insurancelili10 paid holidays and PTOliliMatching 401KliliTuition reimbursementliliDependent scholarship programsliulpbrppbrppEaglePicher is an equal opportunity employer Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age race creed color national origin ancestry marital status affectional or sexual orientation gender identity or expression disability nationality sex
